key_themes: Fed rate-cut expectations and monetary easing
AI productivity narrative and mega-cap concentration
Precious metals exhaustion and retail leverage unwinding
risk_factors: Geopolitical escalation (Ukraine, Taiwan defense) as binary downside trigger
Earnings disappointment spreading systemically beyond isolated weakness
Precious metals liquidation cascade if silver $79.30 support breaks
Breadth momentum failure to expand back toward 150+ names signals correction ahead
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY testing active call wall resistance at $700 (146k OI). Active support holding at $670 (45k OI). QQQ near active resistance at $625 (29k OI) and $630 call wall. Watch for breakout above $700 SPY or breakdown below $670 to confirm directional conviction. No specific intraday levels from professional trader available.
